Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: A preliminary investigation of Tuesday's accident which a passenger lorry from Ashdod overturned and 13 persons were killed indicates the driver may have violated a traffic regulation just before the vehicle slid off the road.
